marklogic.body:
Qaradawi is certainly a hitler loving dirtbag, but I don't think that we should limited these to just the likes of him.
I think that all the saudi royals should be from entefring both Europe AND America.
Let them send their kids to school in Yemen, a country with a particularly vibrant and effervescentÂ intellectual atmosphere.
And for holidays, why not spend some timeÂ Surfing in Somalia?
The gals are all horribly mutilated, the nude beaches well covered,Â and the beerÂ Cold and non-existant.
Just don't forget to bring you beach-towel,Â your suntan oil...andÂ your ransom.Â
Seriously, though, we shouldn't let the Saudis vacation in any decent civilised western country.
